name: BYTE
description: BYTE ($BYTE) is a community-managed cryptocurrency token launched on the Base network. Originally deployed through an AI-assisted process using Grok and Cliza Systems, BYTE operates with a transparent, deflationary supply model. The project emphasizes fairness, with no developer tax, no supply unlocks, and no centralized control over token liquidity. A unique aspect of BYTE’s design is Grok’s wallet, which accumulates liquidity pool fees but is permanently locked and cannot sell or transfer its holdings. This creates a growing, non-circulating supply that reinforces the token’s long-term value framework. BYTE focuses on creating sustainable incentives for holders and building a strong, engaged community.
